The reference mountain chain of this VC is Cottian Alps. The reference mountain landscape of this VC is Dronero. Dronero is a municipality of Cuneo province, Piemonte, Northwestern Italy. Located about 20 Km Northwest to the chief city Cuneo and 100 Km to the South of Turin. Dronero has an expanding industrial area, and a fervent agricultural activity specialized in breeding and cultivating particular crops: apples, peaches, and kiwis. This is the main aspect that have a deeper relashionship with the local asset. For a small mountain community a far with 30 employee is very important for the local economies.
